New Records: Kylian Mbappé has been involved in 80 goals for France in 78 games
Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani scored the first goal for France in the 43rd minute, Jonathan Clauss scored the second goal in the 70th minute, and Kylian Mbappé scored the third goal in the 85th minute
Pre-Game Insights: This was Mbappé's first outing since his move to Real Madrid was announced
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps praised Mbappé's performance and leadership
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bradley Barcola made his France debut in the 81st minute
Others: France will play Canada on Sunday in Bordeaux in their last warm-up match before Euro 2024 starts on June 14
